summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the grant of easement rights beneath the surface of Schmitz Park, and to the Department of Administrative Services, authorizing the grant of easement rights over, under, and across certain City-owned property within the Duwamish Head Greenbelt, to King County for the benefit of the METRO Alki Transfer / CSO Control Project, specifically the West Seattle Sewer Tunnel and West Seattle Pumping Station.
